items.title: Artificial Intelligence-Computational Intelligence in Python
items.headline: Fundamentals of soft computing
objectives_summary: Students will learn the basic techniques of Computational Intelligence/ Soft computing including Fuzzy Logic Systems, Genetic Algorithm, Artificial Neural networks and Hybrid Intelligent Systems like ANFIS.  This course is designed to explain these complex concepts of soft computing in an easy to understand and simplified manner with practical examples implemented in python.
